name: Floot
tagline: Build serious apps with AI without getting stuck
description: Floot lets non-coders & entrepreneurs build serious web apps that actually work. Designed to be super easy to use & powerful. The entire tech stack (backend, DB, hosting, etc) is built-in so you can finally build what you want without headache.

name: Haimeta
tagline: Create stunning images, vivid videos, and lifelike 3D assets
description: From WORD to WORLD — all in one place. Create stunning images, vivid videos, and lifelike 3D assets with 20+ selected top AI models. All your creations seamlessly connect within our high-quality interactive spaces. Just one click, and the world is yours.

name: Patio
tagline: Share tools, learn DIY, and build sustainably
description: Patio is where DIY meets community, learning, and sustainability. Borrow tools, rent yours out, learn with quizzes, discover tutorials, buy/sell tools, and find local resources. Making DIY easier, affordable, and more connected, beginner or pro.

name: Unicorns Club
tagline: Grow, earn Sparks, and get discovered by VCs
description: Since our last launch, Unicorns Club introduced traction-based rankings, community awards, Unicorn Index and Sparks — a new way for startups to earn visibility through real growth. Join now to get featured, ranked, and discovered based on what really matters.

name: Visionstory - Video Podcast
tagline: Turn dialogues to studio-quality video podcasts in seconds
description: Upload audio + headshot → Pick a virtual studio → Get AI-generated avatars performing your podcast in professional sets with multi-angle shots. We aim to cut podcast production time from hours to seconds, and make pro content accessible to anyone.

name: Nas.io v2
tagline: AI agent to build, launch, and sell your digital products
description: Nas.io is an AI-first business platform that helps creators, coaches, and entrepreneurs turn ideas into revenue. Launch courses, events, memberships and more as your "AI cofounder" helps you ideate, build, price, plus design and run ads and email marketing.

name: Simulate by Future AGI
tagline: The voice AI auto-testing loop to simulate, evaluate & ship
description: The 1st AI-powered testing infra for voice AI: evaluate across thousands of real-world scenarios in minutes using simulated agents that stress-test edge cases, detect multilingual issues, and uncover failures missed by humans. Ship reliable voice AI at scale!

name: Graphy 3.0
tagline: From messy data to graphs with a story in seconds.
description: Hate pivot tables? So do we. Graphy is the fastest way to turn messy data into clean, branded, presentation-ready graphs in seconds.

name: xpander.ai
tagline: Turn AI agents into Slack native teammates
description: Turn any AI Agent into a Slack teammate → no infrastructure and scaling headaches. Let agents work where your team or customers already chat. Agent memory, tools, auto-engage - all sorted for you by the xpander.ai backend-as-a-service platform.

name: Gemini Storybook
tagline: Turn any idea into an illustrated story, read aloud
description: Create personalized, illustrated stories with Gemini Storybook. Describe the story you want, and get a unique 10-page book with read-aloud narration.

name: OFFY
tagline: Your tasks created, planned, and executed with an AI agent
description: See a to-do in an email or Slack? Ask OFFLIGHT with a single click. Our AI instantly understands the context, creating an actionable task with a deadline and priority. It then schedules these tasks into a perfect day on your calendar and helps you execute.

name: Roomsy
tagline: Chores Tracker App that makes house cleaning actually fun
description: Roomsy is a cozy app that turns everyday cleaning into something magical. You're not doing it alone — you have a sweet virtual pet that lives in a tiny version of your home.

name: Deskrib.Ai
tagline: Transform ideas into beautiful documents, instantly
description: Deskrib.ai plans trips, researches products & solves complex problems in seconds. Generate business plans, resumes, legal docs & more. Auto-researches your needs with lightning-fast search. Your all-in-one AI co-pilot for smarter, faster decisions.

name: Kreatli
tagline: All-in-one collaboration platform for creative teams
description: We help Creative Teams streamline post production processes and optimize workflows. No more juggling between Slack, Discord, Dropbox, Google Sheets, Docs, WeTransfer, etc. All projects, chats, and files in one place.

name: Melder - AI for Excel
tagline: Upgrade Excel with an analysis agent and AI formulas
description: Melder is an AI add-in for Excel. You can 1) Ask the agent to build your models for you 2) Upload documents into your worksheet and reference them with AI formulas to categorize, summarize, and extract information.

name: GPT-5
tagline: OpenAI’s most advanced model
description: With major improvements in reasoning, code quality, and UX. It handles complex coding tasks with minimal prompting, provides clear explanations, and introduces enhanced agentic capabilities, making it a powerful collaborator and intelligent assistant for all.

name: Athena
tagline: Start tracking your retro gaming achievements like a pro
description: Athena RetroAchievements Tracker is the simplest and most elegant way to follow your progress on Retro Achievements. Stay motivated, complete challenges, and showcase your rewards.

name: RapidNative
tagline: Prompt to React Native & Expo apps
description: RapidNative leverages AI to convert your prompts into production-ready React Native and Expo apps. Ideal for developers, designers, and teams seeking efficient mobile app development.

name: Ductts
tagline: Track how often you cry
description: An iOS app for tracking how often you cry.

name: Transync AI
tagline: AI simultaneous interpretation assistant
description: Transync AI is a multilingual meeting assistant using end-to-end voice models. It supports real-time two-way translation, voice playback in 60 languages, and AI-generated meeting summaries. Dual-screen display ensures efficient bilingual communication.

name: Floot
tagline: Build serious apps with AI without getting stuck
description: Floot lets non-coders & entrepreneurs build serious web apps that actually work. Designed to be super easy to use & powerful. The entire tech stack (backend, DB, hosting, etc) is built-in so you can finally build what you want without headache.
